name: Paris, France
description: The city of love and lights, with iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum.

name: Rome, Italy
description: Explore ancient history at the Colosseum and Vatican City's stunning architecture.

name: Tokyo, Japan
description: A vibrant blend of traditional culture and cutting-edge technology.

name: New York, USA
description: The city that never sleeps, with iconic sights like Times Square and Central Park.

name: Sydney, Australia
description: A tropical paradise with iconic landmarks like the Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge.

name: London, UK
description: The city of iconic landmarks, including the Big Ben clock tower and Buckingham Palace.
